detaileddescription.para: PWM_TIMER Device Work Mode Types Enum
PWM_TIMER interrupt handler or Interrupt Service Routine(ISR)

briefdescription.para: Get an pwm_timer device by pwm_timer device id. For how to use pwm_timer device hal refer to Functions in pwm_timer device structure.

detaileddescription.para:
pwm_timer_id
ID of pwm_timer, defined by user
!NULL
Pointer to an pwm_timer device structure
NULL
Failed to find the pwm_timer device by pwm_timer_id
Need to implemented by user in user code Get one designware device structure

briefdescription.para: Definitions for pwm_timer device hardware layer.

detaileddescription.para: Provide common definitions for pwm_timer device, then software developer can develop pwm_timer driver following this definitions, and the applications can directly call this definition to realize functions
